title: Good X underproduced, due to positive externality

content.prompt: Good X is produced in a perfectly competitive industry in long-run equilibrium. If the consumption of good X generates positive externalities, the private market will produce

choices.label: less than the socially optimum amount of good X
more than the socially optimum amount of good X
the socially optimum amount of good X
good X only if the government grants a subsidy for the production of good X
good X only if the government levies a corrective tax on the production of good X

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
